Posts.Content: Aug 31, 2018 08:31AM ErnRoo wrote: I’m one sided and a B on the one left. I recently found some Jockey bras that have a removable insert with an opening on the sides. I think they are designed for women who don’t want their nipples to show. Anyway where I am concave on my mastectomy side, they poof our a little which is perfect. And I can add a little stuffing into the slot if I want more balance. I hate my prosthesis too. I’ll check the exact style name and let you know. Good luck
Posts.Title: Undergarments and how do you dress wallycat Snickersmom
